description: 31 SPACIOUS THREE-BEDROOM SINGLE FAMILY HOME PROJECT. CHOOSE FROM FOUR METICULOUSLY DESIGNED LAYOUTS. Indulge in the epitome of luxurious living with our homes that redefine sophistication. Every inch of our interiors is thoughtfully curated to inspire, offering a harmonious fusion of modern elegance and timeless appeal. Key features include entertainment-sized kitchens, stunning bathrooms, 9-foot ceilings on the main, high-efficiency gas-powered furnace, on-demand hot water, and optional shiplap feature fireplace wall, central A/C, roughed-in central vacuum, and more. Residents of the charming community of Albion enjoy easy access to local schools, recreation, parks, and trails while maintaining accessibility to urban amenities. Show home open Sat, Sun, and Monday, 12 pm - 4 pm.
